author: hroskes
body:
Based on work put in by many people for public plots last year for DPF15 and again for ICHEP16.  There are always little details to fix with the style for public plots, but hopefully now there will be fewer.

The style options are set through the All In One tool interface.

Aside from a consistent style, also some other fixes:
- small fixes for phase 1 geometry
- ability to run validations without cms-addpkg if you don't want to change anything, at least once this is in a release.
- testValidate example script showing the syntax
- probably other little things I forgot
title: Alignment plotting style and other fixes
